location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.1525 of 1856 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Commander Felix Jones, Acting Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of Jonesâ€™s earlier letter relating to an act of piracy and the plunder of cargo at Sharjah. Anderson writes that the Government awaits further reports on the outcome of the case.
